topic.title: Nobody Knows (2004)
topic.body: In Tokyo, the reckless single mother Keiko moves to a small apartment with her twelve years old son Akira Fukushima and hidden in the luggage, his siblings Kyoko, Shigeru and Yuki. The children have different fathers and do not have schooling, but they have a happy life with their mother. When Keiko finds a new boyfriend, she leaves the children alone, giving some money to Akira and assigning him to take care of his siblings. When the money finishes, Akira manages to find means to survive with the youngsters without power supply, gas or water at home, and with the landlord asking for the rental.

topic.title: Spirited Away
topic.body: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

topic.title: Princess Mononoke
topic.body:
The Fate of the World rests in the Courage of one Warrior. Ashitaka, a prince of the disappearing Ainu tribe (Emishi), 
is cursed by a demonized boar god & must journey to the west to find a cure. Along the way, he encounters an erudite Monk, 
then San - a young human woman fighting to protect the Forest, and Lady Eboshi, who is trying to destroy it. 
In the middle of the War between the Forest Gods and Humans, Ashitaka must find a way to bring balance to this conflict!

topic.title: When Marnie Was There
topic.body: Upon being sent to live with relatives in the countryside, an emotionally distant adolescent girl becomes obsessed with an abandoned mansion and infatuated with a girl

topic.title: Jibeuro (The Way Home)
topic.body: Seven-year-old Sang-woo is left with his grandmother in a remote village while his mother looks for work. Born and raised in the city, Sang-woo quickly comes into conflict
